name: Matthew Kossove
text: I have been ordering a few weeks, and hoped the lack of cheese was just an anomaly.  There specialty white pizzas are good, but they're cheese pizzas, which are for my kids, don't even have enough cheese to cover the sauce. Even after …More

name: Elliott Farber
text: It’s trendy pizza. I was enticed by their menu and tried a pie not too long ago. I was just not impressed. If your curious, try it out. If you want a really good pie, I would go elsewhere

name: Daniel
text: Actually suprisingly good and fresh. Great staff also.

name: Marshall Winslow
text: Veg out pizza and cauliflower crust with spicy red. Delicious.

name: randall skrabonja
text: Pleasantly surprised. Friendly and courteous staff made me feel welcome on my first visit there. Will definitely be back

name: E 561
text: Terrible pizza and don’t ever order for pick up, looks horrible and they will mess it up

name: Kevin Eastwood
text: Smelled great but just stopped in to use the restroom. Will be back to try the food.

name: Joseph Woolridge
text: This spot always delivers. They have awesome dishes for affordable prices, there is no waiting time even when the spot is busy.

name: Mafe Gonzalez
text:
Paul the manager was exceptional!
He was so nice and made my experience amazing!
5 stars for him.

name: Mike Young
text: This place was not good at all . If you enjoy a pizza Soggy, with no cheese and undercooked this is where you should go you will love it. I would rather have dominoes or Pizza Hut don’t even waste your time it was horrible . I mean really …More

name: Ross Black
text: Very friendly and accommodating to our family. Great pizza too!

name: Alexandra Davis
text: We enjoy the freedom of selecting everything online and on platforms like Postmates. Blaze is always yummy however, we consistently have issues with our pizza. The phone line is always busy and doesn’t seem to reach the staff at the …More

name: Kevin Mckenzie
text: Being a courier on the road a lot I have passed this place a dozen times. I am so sorry I waited till now to stop...AWSOME PIZZA.... thanks so much!!! We need a store in Leesburg!!!

name: Michael Littlejohn
text: Brand new. Menu is fantastic. Just a few minutes and it's ready. Sit outside or grab a table inside, counter service is the only choice.  I had the Red Vine pizza with hot sausage and it was fantastic.  Parking is good. Prices are moderate. …More

name: Jeff Vastola
text: We love Blaze pizza but only 4 stars because when the B team is working they are pretty stingy with the toppings. Pretty lame when you open your pizza box and you see more red than white on the top of the pie!

name: Chauna Aguilar
text: Yummy fresh ingredients! Great prices too! Blood orange lemonade was amazing!

name: Hung Huynh
text: Blaze is a make-your-own-pizza place with lots of topping choices. The dough and sauce (the essence of a pizza) is very good. If that's too much for you, they offer a selection of house shorebirds pizzas so you don't have to think to hard. The atmosphere is very casual and they're outdoors eating area well. Very reasonably priced.

name: Jamie Valente
text: Very much enjoyed my vegan pizza today! So happy they have vegan cheese and vegan chorizo. I also had a cup of the strawberry agua fresca which was light and refreshing. Service was super quick. They offer inside seating and an outside area.

name: Brian Brink
text: As a local Business owner I usually have a little different perspective when visiting restaurants. I notice things that in my opinion make the food and the experience just that much better or that much worse.   The pizza was very fresh and …More

name: Robert Henick
text: To be honest, the Blaze pizza on PGA served a better pizza.  Everything looked the same but the flavor of the pies were distinctly different.  The Blaze on PGA, serves the better pie.  Probably someone putting their spin on the sauce here in Jupiter.. just a guess.

name: Jeanne0704 Hibbard
text: Food was interesting. My friends were worth being with and the best part of a meal. The floors looked like we were in a warehouse

name: Adam Goldstick
text: Excellent service, kind staff and great experience!

name: yusdeni fajardo
text: Food Is great price is fair I'll come back any time

name: Chloe Taylor-Lauren
text: I ordered a pizza through Door Dash. The pizza I received wasn’t my order. I called to speak to someone and was told I would have my pizza remade and I would get a refund. Then I was told they were busy and would call me back. I waited 30 …More

name: Brian Suarez
text: This Blaze just recently opened. Place is in a super busy area and they are having some growing pains with all the plaza construction. You can’t fault them for that. What I can fault them for is forgetting to put BBQ on my BBQ Chicken pizza!

name: Summer Sanders
text: Pizza and customer service was amazing! It was my first time, and Paul explained how everything work! Paul alone was amazing, he made some great suggestions, and was super nice! Great first time experience. Paul deserves a management position!

name: Ernesto Fuster
text: the best jupiter pizzas I would like your business to be prosperous so that you can expand it to miami kendall so you can see your business as it really thrives. good treatment, quality, cleaning everything very good

name: Davin Lau
text: I tried Blaze couple months ago and I have to say I’m hooked. Good built your own pizza and I recommend the sugarcane root beer.  Plus both of our kids like different pizzas so it’s great we can customize it to their likings.

name: Jeff Coughanour
text: Me and my family of 5 come here every week because the pizza is simply the best in Jupiter, the staff is very friendly and helpful. The Manager there Jacob is one the most courteous, respectful, and professional employees ive come accross. …More

name: Bonnie Adams
text: Variety is the spice of life, even as toppings on a pizza. Products are fresh and everything we tried tasted great. Quick quality meal

name: Willa Webb
text: Good service and great pizza.  Loved the picnic tables so can be outside with our puppy.

name: E R
text: Only until we got home did the kids realize all the bottom of the pizza was burnt.  A little is acceptable but this is ridiculous.

name: Stacey Carey
text: Very excited to stumble across Blaze Pizza's newest location in Jupiter. Conveniently located on Indiantown Rd, minutes off highways, I95 and Turnpike and includes a spacious outdoor seating area. We were greeted by tonight's shift manager, …More

name: Matthew Fischer
text: Great pizza, alittle pricy, but quick service. Nice selection of lemonades and other non carbonated drinks

name: Larissa Diaz
text: Chase, Brendan & Paul were amazing ! Very satisfied!! Will definitely come back

name: Ron Goldberg
text: Best new pizza franchise around.  It's all about the crust.

name: Dhroov Patel
text: The staff was all very nice and the pizza was excellent! There are so many varieties offered at Blaze so there's always something new to try. I'm glad that they brought the franchise to Jupiter, since the closest one before was in Palm …More

name: Tracy Horton
text: Thought possibly it says beer/wine, but must be waiting for the permit maybe. But overall it was a EXCELLENT EXPERIENCE!! The pizza was outstanding 👌, the staff were younger adults & were very helpful and friendly (not bratty), and finally the restaurant was very clean! Bonus: Loved they had Music playing (++)!

name: Ryan Kidd
text: Ok so I tried Blaze Pizza for the first time with my Dad on Fathers Day. That is where he wanted to grab lunch well we ran some errands to fix his computer. As a fast food Pizza place it was not bad.  We didn't wait long, and the toppings seems fresh, and the pie was not burnt. So For our first time I think we both enjoyed the pizza.

name: Adam Turcsanyi
text: When they opened, the quality was higher. The pizza what I've got today, was raw in the middle. It took me 2 slices to realize. My bad...

name: Oliver K
text: Great pizza and great service! Get the hot link and add ricotta, kalamata olives, and mushrooms 👌

name: Don Jacobs
text: Blaze Pizza always deliers - some of the best pizza around!

name: Richard Sandström
text: Great fast food pizza. The dough and crust great.

name: Jack Nicklaus
text: Amazing pizza, especially considering the cost and the turnaround time. On top of that, the service is constantly wonderful. Always extremely polite and helpful.

name: Sam Stout
text: I usually love blaze and I’ve been to many, unfortunately, this one was disappointing; seems like they’ve opened too soon...the toppings did not look very fresh, and lettuce for salads were brown. The staff working there seemed underprepared for a line of more than one customer.

name: Barbara Sullivan
text: Not what I ordered! Can’t reach anyone to discuss/complain/get satisfaction veg pizza came with raw sweet potatoes and none of the other promised veg!

name: Denise Demarest
text: Love Blaze Pizza. Just needed to be a little crisper on the bottom.

name: Jake Whales
text: Quick and easy. Lovely and Simple. There is great quality pizza with ingredients of your choice.

name: Captain Bubzy
text: The workers were friendly and helpful and I could not believe how fast they made the pizzas. The pizzas were cooked just right and tasted amazing. The menu had many options to choose from.

name: Joshua Eads
text: I went on the grand opening, so mistakes can be forgiven when it's so hectic. The employees were fairly friendly. I had the white pizza, but they put chicken on it for some reason. Again, not a problem. Quality of the toppings is okay. The …More

text: Top choice smoked pizza place, I'm glad its growing.

name: G. A.
text: Good crust selection. Flavourful. Fast.

text: Fast service. Kids and adults loved customizing their own pizzas. Reasonably priced. The rootbeer gets 5⭐

name: Jacob Howie
text: Went there today and their door was locked during open hours. Went to bolay instead. I even tried to call their number and when you press 2 to talk to someone there it hangs the phone up.

name: Jhoniesha Liberty
text: I'm only give this a two because the pizza was actually pretty good. But I went in and I had a coupon for a free pizza which had no limit to what pizza could and couldn't be free. I waiting 30min in line which I figured would be worth it. I …More

text: Amazing quality and very affordable prices.

name: David Ham
text: Started eating Blaze when I heard Lebron dropped his McDonalds endorsement of to become a owner in Blaze. I eat as healthy as I can, and you can tell before and after eating that Blaze uses flavorful, clean ingredients.

It was better than I thought it would be

text: After eating at the Blaze on PGA Blvd, I was very excited for the Blaze opening in Jupiter. Since it opened a couple weeks ago, I've been in a few times with varying experiences. I've found that the quality of service is extremely dependent …More

text: They don't sell the pizza by the slice so if you are hungry and you want to eat there for lunch you have to buy a half of pizza or a whole pizza

text: Spent 30 minutes trying to order online but system was down. Drove there and waited in line for another 20 minutes only to be told they were accepting cash only. Someone held the door for me when I walked in so I missed the sign on the …More
